metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18520 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An Invalid Memory Address Dereference exists in the function elf_end in libelf in elfutils through v0.174. Although eu-size is intended to support ar files inside ar files, handle_ar in size.c closes the outer ar file before handling all inner entries. The vulnerability allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) with a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: elfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.176-1.1').
